Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Southbound Reroute near 71st/Paxton
ShortDescription: SB 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Jeffery, 73rd, & Yates, due to street blockage near 71st/Paxton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Jeffery, 73rd, & Yates, due to street blockage near 71st/Paxton.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
